payload.description: Add new CSS animations to frontend/src/index.css: fadeInUp, scaleIn, slideInRight with staggered animation delays. Include utility classes for animations.
payload.context: fadeInUp: opacity 0->1, translateY 20px->0, 0.4s ease-out. scaleIn: opacity 0->1, scale 0.95->1, 0.3s ease-out. slideInRight: opacity 0->1, translateX 20px->0, 0.3s ease-out. Add .stagger-1 through .stagger-5 with 0.05s increments.
